name: Night of the Accursed King
description:
The king has been cursed by a powerful evil! You must save him before Cursemas Morning, or he will forever be trapped in this accursed form.
You must break into the castle and free him from the spell, watch out though, the evil responsible for this may still be lurking around.

A game made for Shenanijam 2019 by FelixNemis

Gameplay video:


Controls:

Move: Arrow keys or gamepad left stick/dpad

Attack: V or gamepad A (nintendo B)

Reset: R

Change Window Size: P

The game has sounds but no music

Credits:
All assets, code and design by Charlie Burnham (FelixNemis)
Tools used:

Godot game engine 3.1

Aseprite

Audacity

The internet
